name: AI Gotta Go
description:
Coming Soon

AI Gotta Go is a sci-fi action platformer with a focus on speed and movement. You play as C1D, a robot who has gained sentience and is now being hunted by the Controller, the AI in charge of the factory you were created in. Use your grappling hand and upgrade your body parts to escape the facility before you're destroyed.

Team Members: Zach Adamson, Joshua Armbrecht, Min Bucheger, Kyle Christensen, Tyler Christianson, Dylan Hestwood, Madeline Huc, Logan Pribyl, Logan Steffen, Samuel Tackett, Tim Wenzel
